Question: AIRA Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AIRA Corporation

Product: airaTrack

- Facial recognition system for employee attendance and temporary staff management
- Notable 93% reduction in manpower time costs
- Enhancements in personnel and internal hotel security
- Features like automatic tracking of personnel paths and saving 97% of target searching time
- Demonstrated at CES 2024, drawing significant attention and media coverage
- Set to present more comprehensive solutions at ISCWest in April
Summary_cn:
AIRA 公司

产品：airaTrack

- 面部识别系统，用于员工考勤和临时人员管理
- 显著减少93%的人力时间成本
- 提升人员和酒店内部安全性
- 具有自动追踪人员路径和节省97%目标搜索时间的功能
- 在2024年CES上展示，引起了广泛关注和媒体报道
- 将在4月份的ISCWest展会上展示更全面的解决方案
